channel.title: I need help with some commands

item.title: I need help with some commands
item.dc:creator: @PhillyClarke2 PhillyClarke2
item.description:
@PhillyClarke2 wrote:

Ok here you go:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(195000000, 0); addSkillXP(195000000, 1); addSkillXP(159000000, 2); addSkillXP(150900000, 3); addSkillXP(150090000, 4); addSkillXP(150009000, 5); addSkillXP(150090000, 6); addSkillXP(150090000, 7); addSkillXP(150009000, 8); addSkillXP(150009000, 9); addSkillXP(195000000, 10); addSkillXP(159000000, 11); addSkillXP(150900000, 12); addSkillXP(150090000, 13); addSkillXP(150009000, 14); addSkillXP(150000900, 15); addSkillXP(150000090, 16); addSkillXP(150000009, 17); addSkillXP(195000000, 18); addSkillXP(159000000, 19); addSkillXP(150900000, 20); sendMessage("You are maxed out!"); }

And i only have ::xteletome [NAME]

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them"; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }

To add these, go to client.jave and Hold

CTRL and push F

search for customcommand
and after

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “imgay”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “imgay”);
command.trim();

Put it in there and compile, ta da all done, Only works for admin

Read full topic
